full_summary:
# Foot and Mouth Disease Vaccine Bank [Request for Information]

## RFI Overview

The objective of this Request for Information (RFI) is to solicit information from suppliers regarding their interest in providing Foot and Mouth Disease (FMD) vaccine bank for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

### Background

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires a reliable vaccine bank to ensure the health and safety of Canada's cattle, sheep, and swine populations. The vaccine bank is a critical component in the prevention and control of FMD in Canada.

### RFI Terms

* Solicitation Number: WS4085182848
* Publication Date: July 6, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 11, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET)
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 28, 2024

### Contract Requirements

* Category: Drugs and Pharmaceutical Products
* UNSPSC Code: 51000000
* Région de la capitale nationale (NCR)

### Procurement Process

This tender is open to suppliers who can provide a reliable vaccine bank for CFIA. Suppliers will be selected based on their ability to meet CFIA's requirements.

### Contact Information

* Joy, Sharon (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: Not available
* Email: [sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16793216?extsite=MTY3OTMyMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: This RFI does not constitute an Official Solicitation. Suppliers are requested to submit their information by the specified closing date. Responding to this RFI does not obligate the requesting party, nor does it commit the requesting party to award a contract to any respondent. The Canadian government uses various trade agreements, including the WTO GPA, to govern procurement processes. Eligible suppliers are expected to familiarize themselves with these trade agreements and requirements.
